main event: A round, red object was observed moving straight up and headed east before fading away.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes.,The object was described as round and red.,There were no other aircraft in the area during the sighting.,The observer reported it on 13 August 1955.,The conclusion indicated that it might be a weather balloon.
witness description: a 46-year-old plumber, no specific name provided
